tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Fields (
 field_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 field_name VARCHAR(50),
 crop_name VARCHAR(50),
 crop_biodiversity INT
)

CREATE TABLE Crop_Fields (
    field_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    field_name TEXT,
    crop_name TEXT,
    crop_species TEXT,
    planting_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Planting (
 planting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 field_id INT NOT NULL,
 crop_id INT NOT NULL,
 planting_date DATE NOT NULL,
 amount_planted DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
 FOREIGN KEY (field_id) REFERENCES Field(field_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (crop_id) REFERENCES Crop(crop_id)
);
CREATE TABLE fields (field_id INT, field_name VARCHAR(50), location VARCHAR(100), crop_type VARCHAR(50), biodiversity_level INT)
CREATE TABLE crops (crop_id INT, crop_name VARCHAR(50), disease_prevention_method VARCHAR(100), season VARCHAR(50)
CREATE TABLE crop_history (crop_history_id INT, crop_id INT, field_id INT, planting_date DATE, harvest_date DATE)
CREATE TABLE diseases (disease_id INT, disease_name VARCHAR(50), prevention_method VARCHAR(100), affected_crops VARCHAR(100)
